text: aur agar ham chaahen to ham use unhen aayaton kee badaulat buland marataba kar dete magar vah to khud hee pastee (neeche) kee taraph jhuk pada aur apanee naphasaanee khvaahish ka taabedaar ban baitha to usakee masal hai ki agar usako dhutkaar do to bhee zabaan nikaale rahe aur usako chhod do to bhee zabaan nikale rahe ye masal un logon kee hai jinhonne hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaaya to (ai rasool) ye qisse un logon se bayaan kar do taaki ye log khud bhee gaur karen
